resources.string: choose the greatest number.\nthe questions can be repeated until you get 20 points

"Congratulations, you did it !!!\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest number. There are 7 days a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 music notes, 7 days of creation, and more. Also, the number 7 is most often the favorite number around the world."
choose the greatest romanian number.\nthe questions can be repeated until you get 20 points
well done!!!\n did you know that there is no number zero in romanian numbers?
choose edible. \nthe questions can be repeated until you get 20 points
Good Job Champ!!!\n it is known that many crocodiles swallow stones, but not because they are edible, the stones help them stay at the bottom of the river.
